Name: Breaker
Effect: Critical Hits destroy the target's Shield or Armor (reduce AR).

Name: Execute
Effect: Advantage on attacks against targets with <50% HP.

Name: Reaper
Effect: If you kill a target make a second attack instantly (Free Action).

Name: Wear
Effect: Sleeping in armor causes no Fatigue/Penalties.

Name: Deflect
Effect: Reaction: Reduce incoming Ranged Damage by your Armor Rating.

Name: Turtle
Effect: You cannot be Critically Hit while Flanked.

Name: Bulwark
Effect: You provide Full Cover to allies behind you.

Name: Hasty
Effect: You can use a Tool (Potion/Trap) as a Bonus Action.

Name: Recycle
Effect: On a successful Tool check roll d6. On 6 you keep the consumable.

Name: Improv
Effect: You can use Tools without a Kit (using nearby junk) at no penalty.

Name: MacGyver
Effect: You can disable Magical Traps/Locks using non-magical tools.

Name: Reliable
Effect: If you roll a Natural 1 on a Utility check reroll it (once).

Name: Assist
Effect: When you Help an ally they add your Attribute Die to their roll.

Name: Fast
Effect: Perform long tasks (Searching room First Aid) in half the time.

Name: Ghost
Effect: You can Hide while being observed (Shadow Step).
